title: Rethinking My Goals
description: Emma talks about rethinking her goals and finding a healthier definition of success.
speaker: Emma
text: For many years, I followed a clear plan for my future without questioning it.
I believed that success meant achieving specific goals as quickly as possible.
Last year, however, I experienced a period of stress and dissatisfaction.
I realized that my goals no longer matched my interests or values.
After taking some time to reflect, I decided to adjust my plans.
I focused more on learning, personal growth, and maintaining a healthy balance.
This change did not bring immediate results, but it made me feel more motivated and calm.
Now, I believe that success is not only about reaching goals, but also about enjoying the journey.
